[http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0096555/episodes#season-13 IMDB Casualty Series 13] It saw another increase, this time to 28 episodes (the first two episodes aired on consecutive nights), including a feature-length Christmas episode. The series also acted as a launchpad for characters and storylines in the spin-off series [[Holby City]], which started in January 1999.
